ColorShapeLinks AI
An AI competition for the IEEE Conference on Games

9 using System;
10 using System.Collections.Generic;
11 using ColorShapeLinks.Common;
12 using ColorShapeLinks.Common.AI;
13 using ColorShapeLinks.Common.Session;
14 using ColorShapeLinks.TextBased.Lib;
15 
16 namespace ColorShapeLinks.TextBased.App
17 {
22  public class SimpleRenderingListener :
23  IThinkerListener, IMatchListener, ISessionListener
24  {
25  // Who's playing?
26  private PColor turn = PColor.White;
27 
30  public void ListenTo(IThinker subject)
31  {
32  subject.ThinkingInfo += ThinkingInfo;
33  }
34 
37  public void ListenTo(IMatchSubject subject)
38  {
39  subject.MatchStart += MatchStart;
40  subject.BoardUpdate += BoardUpdate;
41  subject.NextTurn += NextTurn;
42  subject.InvalidPlay += InvalidMove;
43  subject.MovePerformed += MovePerformed;
44  subject.MatchOver += MatchOver;
45  }
46 
49  public void ListenTo(ISessionSubject subject)
50  {
51  subject.BeforeSession += BeforeSession;
52  subject.AfterSession += AfterSession;
53  subject.BeforeMatch += BeforeMatch;
54  subject.AfterMatch += AfterMatch;
55  }
56 
57  // ///////////////////////////////// //
58  // Methods for listening to thinkers //
59  // ///////////////////////////////// //
60 
61  // Show thinking info
62  private void ThinkingInfo(string thinkingInfo)
63  {
64  // Show thinking info
65  Console.WriteLine($"{turn} thinker says: {thinkingInfo}");
66  }
67 
68  // //////////////////////////////// //
69  // Methods for listening to matches //
70  // //////////////////////////////// //
71 
72  // Renders information about the match about to start
73  private void MatchStart(
74  IMatchConfig matchConfig, IList<string> thinkerNames)
75  {
76  // Show who's playing
77  Console.WriteLine(
78  $"=> {thinkerNames[0]} (White) vs {thinkerNames[1]} (Red) <=\n");
79 
80  // Show piece legend
81  Console.WriteLine("\tw - White Round");
82  Console.WriteLine("\tW - White Square");
83  Console.WriteLine("\tr - Red Round");
84  Console.WriteLine("\tR - Red Square");
85  Console.WriteLine();
86  }
87 
88  // Renders the match board as follows:
89  // w - Round white pieces
90  // W - Square white pieces
91  // r - Round red pieces
92  // R - Square red pieces
93  private void BoardUpdate(Board board)
94  {
95  for (int r = board.rows - 1; r >= 0; r--)
96  {
97  for (int c = 0; c < board.cols; c++)
98  {
99  char pc = '.';
100  Piece? p = board[r, c];
101  if (p.HasValue)
102  {
103  if (p.Value.Is(PColor.White, PShape.Round))
104  pc = 'w';
105  else if (p.Value.Is(PColor.White, PShape.Square))
106  pc = 'W';
107  else if (p.Value.Is(PColor.Red, PShape.Round))
108  pc = 'r';
109  else if (p.Value.Is(PColor.Red, PShape.Square))
110  pc = 'R';
111  else
112  throw new ArgumentException(
113  $"Invalid piece '{p.Value}'");
114  }
115  Console.Write(pc);
116  }
117  Console.WriteLine();
118  }
119  Console.WriteLine();
120  }
121 
122  // Renders info about the next turn
123  private void NextTurn(PColor thinkerColor, string thinkerName)
124  {
125  Console.WriteLine($"{thinkerColor.FormatName(thinkerName)} turn");
126  turn = thinkerColor;
127  }
128 
129  // Displays notification that the specified thinker lost due to an
130  // invalid play
131  private void InvalidMove(
132  PColor thinkerColor, string thinkerName, string reason)
133  {
134  Console.WriteLine(String.Format("{0} loses match! Reason: {1}",
135  thinkerColor.FormatName(thinkerName), reason));
136  }
137 
138  // Displays the move performed by the specified thinker
139  private void MovePerformed(
140  PColor thinkerColor, string thinkerName,
141  FutureMove move, int thinkingTime)
142  {
143  Console.WriteLine(thinkerColor.FormatName(thinkerName)
144  + $" placed a {move.shape} piece at column {move.column}"
145  + $" after {thinkingTime}ms");
146  }
147 
148  // Renders the match over screen, showing the final result
149  private void MatchOver(
150  Winner winner,
151  ICollection<Pos> solution,
152  IList<string> thinkerNames)
153  {
154  // Did the match end in a draw?
155  if (winner == Winner.Draw)
156  {
157  // If so, show that information
158  Console.WriteLine("Game ended in a draw");
159  }
160  else
161  {
162  // Otherwise, show match results
163  PColor winnerColor = winner.ToPColor();
164  int winnerIdx = (int)winnerColor;
165  string winnerName = thinkerNames[winnerIdx];
166 
167  // Show who won
168  Console.WriteLine(
169  $"Winner is {winnerColor.FormatName(winnerName)}");
170 
171  // Show the solution, if available
172  if (solution != null)
173  {
174  Console.Write("Solution=");
175  foreach (Pos pos in solution)
176  {
177  Console.Write(pos);
178  }
179  Console.WriteLine();
180  }
181  }
182  }
183 
184  // ///////////////////////////////// //
185  // Methods for listening to sessions //
186  // ///////////////////////////////// //
187 
188  // Lists matches to play before the session starts
189  private void BeforeSession(ISessionDataProvider sessionData)
190  {
191  Console.WriteLine("Matches to play:");
192  foreach (Match match in sessionData.Matches)
193  {
194  Console.WriteLine($"\t{match}");
195  }
196  Console.WriteLine();
197  }
198 
199  // Shows the final standings after the session is over
200  private void AfterSession(ISessionDataProvider sessionData)
201  {
202  int i = 0;
203  Console.WriteLine("\nFinal standings:");
204  foreach (KeyValuePair<string, int> tp in sessionData.Standings)
205  {
206  Console.WriteLine($"\t{++i}. {tp.Key,-20} {tp.Value,8}");
207  }
208  }
209 
210  // Shows what match is about to be played
211  private void BeforeMatch(Match match)
212  {
213  Console.WriteLine($"* {match} now playing...");
214  }
215 
216  // Shows match result after match is over
217  private void AfterMatch(Match match, ISessionDataProvider sessionData)
218  {
219  string resultStr;
220  if (sessionData.LastMatchResult == Winner.Draw)
221  resultStr = "It's a draw";
222  else
223  resultStr = $"Winner is {sessionData.WinnerString}";
224  Console.WriteLine($" - {resultStr}");
225  }
226  }
227 }
